wikipedia_page.main: PJ Pat Gallagher (born 14 February 1973) is a former boxer who was the undefeated British super featherweight champion in 1996. He also won the WBC International Super-Feather Weight Title.

response: P. J. Gallagher may refer to:
* P. J. Gallagher (comedian), Irish stand-up comedian
* P. J. Gallagher (politician), American politician in the state of Washington
